column4: can anyone help me with my problem of playing xvid and divx files in jaunty jackalope?
i only get sound and no video
have you got the codecs installed?
sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras should take care of that and other propritary stuff
and which player were you trying to play them in?
ill try that line in terminal but i believe i have it. maybe a reboot after install?
no this is Linux not Windows, you only need to reboot for major stuff, such as say a new kernel
also i am trying vlc, xine, gxine. mplayer pretty much all of them
if mplayer can't do it hum
Banshee is another,  I guess it's better as a music player really though
it came to this when i ran that line: E: Couldn't find package ubuntu-restricted-extra
s at the end
extras
ubuntu-restricted-extras is already the newest version
humm
this is strange
maybe  midibuntu is of  some use in your case, but  I thought could just play divx and xvid without needing midibuntu
!midibuntu | kditty
spelling humm
!medibuntu | kditty
!medibuntu | kditty
thans sebsebseb  ill check this out brb
thanks*
if that's no good,  your issue is something else entirely it seems
